text: Raphael Mark John De Mesa Eigenmann (25 September 1961 - 1 September 2014), better known by his stage name Mark Gil, was a Filipino actor. He appeared in the movie Batch '81 (1982). He also appeared in the ABS-CBN drama television series The Legal Wife, starring Angel Locsin. The series aired between January and June 2014. Gil was born in Manila. His mother, actress Rosemarie Gil, was of Filipino and Spanish ancestry. His father, actor and singer Eddie Mesa, was of Swiss and German ancestry. He was married four times and had five children. Gil died from liver cirrhosis on 1 September 2014 in Manila.
